noun.description: Any of the Scandinavian seafaring pirates and traders who raided and settled in many parts of northwestern Europe in the 8th–11th centuries.

adjective.description: Relating to the Vikings or the period in which they lived.

proper noun.description: Either of two American space probes sent to Mars in 1975, each of which consisted of a lander that conducted experiments on the surface and an orbiter.

origin: From Old Norse víkingr, from vík creek or Old English wīc camp, dwelling place.
